programme.desc: Rindu Bukan Rindu mengisahkan kisah seorang wanita bernama Rindu yang merasa bertuah memiliki seorang lelaki bernama Devan. Kedua-duanya tinggal di Jepun dan menghabiskan masa bersama. Devan sentiasa berada di dekat Rindu, melindungi dan mencintainya. Hubungan di antara mereka terasa sangat rapat dan sempurna. Tetapi suatu hari, Rindu melihat Devan memegang tangan seorang wanita lain. Apakah yang terjadi di antara mereka?

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu S1 Ep476
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Qari Cilik S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat untuk menghafal al-Quran bagi kanak-kanak sehingga berusia 14 tahun.

programme.title: Merajut Gorontalo S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Separa dokumentari yang menerokai tradisi masakan Gorontalo yang pelbagai dan unik. Program ini menampilkan hidangan tradisional, cara penyediaan yang asli, dan budaya masakan tempatan di daerah Gorontalo.

programme.title: Aaa Kasian Aaa Kesengsem Sama Idolaaa
programme.desc: Tanpa sengaja, Vivian bertembung dengan Mike. Ternyata, Mike adalah seorang idola yang digemari ramai wanita dan dikejar-kejar oleh para peminatnya kerana ketampanannya.

programme.title: Mega Series Suara Hati Istri: Anjani S1 Ep62
programme.desc: Anjani berkahwin dengan Ammar melalui perkahwinan yang diatur, namun malangnya Ammar tidak mencintai Anjani, terutamanya selepas mengetahui bahawa Anjani sukar untuk hamil. Akhirnya, Anjani mengambil anak angkat yang ternyata mempunyai rahsia masa lalu dalam kehidupan suaminya.

programme.title: Doyan Makan S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Doyan Makan menjemput penonton untuk mengikuti perjalanan dan pengalaman kulinari untuk makanan popular di kawasan tersebut, serta akan meninjau informasi tentang tempat, harga dan proses penghasilan makanan yang mereka nikmati.

programme.title: My Heart S1 Ep89
programme.desc: Raisa yang patah hati selepas tunangnya, Rio, hilang tiba-tiba, pergi ke Jakarta untuk mencari jawapan. Di sana, dia bertemu Mike, seorang pelakon drama popular yang sebenarnya berperwatakan sensitif dan bermasalah, berbeza dengan wataknya di kaca TV. Perkenalan mereka secara kebetulan menjadi semakin rapat apabila mereka mula mengenali diri sebenar masing-masing. Namun, cinta mereka diuji apabila terbongkar bahawa ibu Mike, Rika, adalah isteri kedua kepada ayah Raisa, menyebabkan perebutan harta antara keluarga mereka.

programme.title: Merajut Gorontalo S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Separa dokumentari yang menerokai tradisi masakan Gorontalo yang pelbagai dan unik. Program ini menampilkan hidangan tradisional, cara penyediaan yang asli, dan budaya masakan tempatan di daerah Gorontalo.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu S1 Ep477
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Mak Comblang Cantiknya Terlalu ke Selatan
programme.desc: Rere dan Farhan adalah agen biro jodoh yang bertugas mencari jodoh untuk ramai orang. Farhan sudah sering berjaya dalam tugasnya, manakala Rere belum pernah berjaya sama sekali. Persaingan antara mereka sangat sengit. Hingga suatu malam, Rere bertekad untuk mencuri buku yang dimiliki Farhan. Dia berjaya mencuri buku tersebut dan menukarnya dengan buku lain.

programme.title: Lucky Voice S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Program permainan yang menguji pengetahuan muzik dengan pelbagai hadiah menarik.

programme.title: MISS FORTUNE
programme.desc: Swindler Ji-Hye is looking to make her last big score. Together with her daughter, they infiltrate the house of a cultural property broker with a net worth of 60 billion won.

programme.title: CONFESSION (2014)
programme.desc: Three lifelong friends get wrapped up in a robbery-arson case. Suspicious of the investigation and the police, Hyun-tae starts digging for the truth himself and asks his best friend for help.

programme.title: BOTTOM OF THE WATER
programme.desc: Ga-young's sister died six year ago. One day, Ga-young is chased by a vengeful water spirit who appears as her sister. She strives to solve the mystery of her sister's tragic death.

programme.title: USURY ACADEMY
programme.desc: Kang-jin is bullied as the lowest-ranking boy at school with no presence and money. He starts a business on private loans by chance and soon rises to the top of the school hierarchy.

programme.title: RETURN OF THE MAFIA
programme.desc: 10 years ago, the mafia family welcomed the entrepreneur Dae-suh as the son-in-law. They set up a company and Dae-Suh becomes the president. The family plot a conspiracy against him...

programme.title: OKAY! MADAM
programme.desc: A married couple unwittingly becomes involved in a rescue operation of a hijacked aircraft during their first-ever family trip abroad to Hawaii.

programme.title: A YEAR-END MEDLEY
programme.desc: From awkward first love to crush on a friend and long forgotten love, 14 love-struck individuals are brought together at Hotel Emross on New Year's Eve.

programme.title: THE ROUNDUP: NO WAY OUT
programme.desc: There is a drug case links to an organized crime organization in Japan. Despite the expanding scale of the case, the beast cop and his team strive their best to arrest the criminal...

programme.title: HIDDEN FACE
programme.desc: While Sung-jin is searching for his fiance Su-yeon, he meets her friend Mi-ju. A breathtaking thriller unfolds in which Su-yeon, who is trapped in a secret room, witnesses a naked truth.

programme.title: I DON'T FIRE MYSELF
programme.desc: Being discriminated as a woman, Jeong-eun was dispatched and given great pressure to resign, but she is not willing to simply give up...

programme.title: 4PM
programme.desc: A couple moved to a new house, dreaming of a peaceful country life. But they face a terrifying reality due to their neighbor, who visits them at the same time every day with just silence

programme.title: THE SWINDLERS
programme.desc: Though each has their own motives, unlikely individuals from different sides of the law allies together to achieve a common goal - trapping the world's most legendary con man.

programme.title: IL MARE
programme.desc: A young woman from 1999 and a young man from 1997 begin a parallel-time love story separated by a span of two years when they start to receive each other's letters in the mailbox.

programme.title: A YEAR-END MEDLEY
programme.desc: From awkward first love to crush on a friend and long forgotten love, 14 love-struck individuals are brought together at Hotel Emross on New Year's Eve.

programme.title: THE KING'S LETTERS
programme.desc: King Sejong desires to create an original alphabet for his people. With the help of others, they struggle to create the Korean alphabet Hangul.

programme.title: A REASON TO LIVE
programme.desc: TV producer Da-hye lost her fianc in an accident. She forgave the young criminal and moved on. A year later, she starts filming a documentary on forgiveness and is shocked to find out...

programme.title: SWITCH
programme.desc: The life of a top star actor was turned upside down when he meets a taxi driver on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: THE ROUNDUP: NO WAY OUT
programme.desc: There is a drug case links to an organized crime organization in Japan. Despite the expanding scale of the case, the beast cop and his team strive their best to arrest the criminal...

programme.title: THE CHILDE
programme.desc: A Kopino boxer goes to Korea to search for his estranged father for his mother's surgery, but his surroundings have turned into a mess after he met a mysterious man known as "Nobleman"...

programme.title: USURY ACADEMY
programme.desc: Kang-jin is bullied as the lowest-ranking boy at school with no presence and money. He starts a business on private loans by chance and soon rises to the top of the school hierarchy.

programme.title: THE KING
programme.desc: Believing power is paramount, Tae-soo aspires to become a prosecutor. As he achieves his goal and rises to power, he also sees the cruelty of a life at the top hierarchy in 90's Korea.

programme.title: I (2021)
programme.desc: Ah-Young who grew up in an orphanage becomes the babysitter of Young-Chae, who is raising a 6-month-old child on her own. One day, her child has an accident and she places all the blame on Ah-Young...

programme.title: LONG LIVE THE KING
programme.desc: Based on a popular web-based series, a mobster meets a headstrong lawyer who he falls in love with at first sight and ignites a desire to change for the better.

programme.title: THE KING'S LETTERS
programme.desc: King Sejong desires to create an original alphabet for his people. With the help of others, they struggle to create the Korean alphabet Hangul.

programme.title: HEAR ME: OUR SUMMER
programme.desc: Yong-jun is working as a delivery man when he meets and instantly falls for Yeo-reum, the devoted sister of a gifted deaf swimmer. Yeo-reum slowly opens her heart to warm-hearted Yong-jun.

programme.title: HARBIN
programme.desc: In 1908, Ahn Jung-geun and Korean independence fighters win against Japanese army. A year later, they head to Harbin as the Japanese statesman Uto Hirobumi is going for negotiation...

programme.title: STEEL RAIN: SUMMIT
programme.desc: A peace summit for Korea is derailed when the leaders of South Korea, North Korea and the U.S. are abducted by North Korean hardliners and held hostage in a submarine.

programme.title: THE WILD
programme.desc: Woo-chul is released early for good behavior after 8 years in jail. His friend Do-sik invites him to join the gang but he wants to live an honest life. Can Woo-chul keep his hands clean?

programme.title: 4PM
programme.desc: A couple moved to a new house, dreaming of a peaceful country life. But they face a terrifying reality due to their neighbor, who visits them at the same time every day with just silence

programme.title: THE EXCLUSIVE: BEAT THE DEVIL'S TATTOO
programme.desc: When a journalist discovers that his exclusive story on a serial killer was based on false information, he fabricates more lies to cover his mistake.

programme.title: CODE NAME: JACKAL
programme.desc: Serial killer Jackal is said to appear at a hotel where K-pop star Choi Hyun is staying. Min-Jung is a hitman hired to kill Choi. Curious chemistry develops between Choi and Min-Jung.

programme.title: Just for You S1 Ep45
programme.desc: Two brothers, living just 300 meters apart, lead vastly different lives. The elder, Kai-Teng Chiao, a former athlete turned plumber, gave up his dreams to support his family and finds unexpected healing through a connection with a distant, cold-hearted prosecutor. Meanwhile, the younger, Hsi-Ming Chiao, a successful lawyer, is forced to confront the painful past he buried, which includes his breakup and his fathers suicide, when he meets Pao-Chi Hsu, the woman who holds the key to the memories he lost a decade ago.

programme.title: Top Singers S1 Ep691
programme.desc: The show 'Top Singers' aims to spotlight outstanding Taiwanese singers and composers, setting a new standard in the industry. Combining elements of competition, variety, and personal stories, the show welcomes participants of all ages. Its goals include discovering grassroots talent, innovating Taiwanese song performance styles, and involving more local talent in song composition to infuse new life into Taiwanese music.

programme.title: Show Biz S1 Ep1098

programme.title: Girls Tease S1 Ep30
programme.desc: This show focuses on the issues that are most important to urban modern women. It combines current events with discussions of life's major and minor problems and invites various specialists to address various difficulties. Netizens will occasionally attend the show to share their own stories and ask questions of the guests and experts, making the topics more relevant and audience-focused!

programme.title: Chef's Unexpected Landing: Hakka Kitchen 2 2 S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Chefs Unexpected Landing: Hakka Kitchen 2 unites Leeteuk, James, and a lineup of Korean and Taiwanese celebrities to create inventive Hakka-Korean fusion dishes. Using traditional Hakka ingredients with Korean flavours, the team tests their creations through pop-ups and food trucks in Korea. 2

programme.title: Battle Tour - EastvsWest S1 Ep8
programme.desc: It is more than just a food and travel show as it is a cultural journey. The program blends travel, cuisine, and culture, inviting viewers not only to taste but also to experience the stories, people, and places behind Taiwanese food and destinations. Through lively food challenges, scenic explorations, and authentic local encounters, the hosts bring audiences closer to Taiwans diverse flavors and vibrant traditions.

programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Rainy Night Flower S1 Ep3
programme.desc: After leaving reformatory, Xin Xiong joins a gang to make a living and soon he becomes a leader of the gang. He takes protection fees from vendors and works hard to 'maintain the local order' in his way. He has thus developed a very good relationship with the law enforcement unit. Later, a teahouse owner Gui Zhu has fallen in love with Xin Xiong who loves Yue Gui. The triangle relationship is entangled with jealousy.

programme.title: Rainy Night Flower S1 Ep4

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa S1 Ep306
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: Taste of Life S1 Ep241
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai Chao and his wife have five children. Having devoted his entire life to developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai sincerely hopes that one of his children will follow in his footsteps and take over the family business. However, he also respects their individual passions and aspirations. Because of their fathers dream of innovation, the lives of the Chao brothers are about to change.

programme.title: Just Eat S1 Ep62
programme.desc: In the new culinary show Just Eat, celebrities reveal their favorite chefs and memorable dishes. This series explores how these culinary experiences have impacted their lives, from overcoming personal struggles to finding new career paths. Join us to discover the flavors and stories that resonate with these well-known personalities.

programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan S1 Ep5238
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau III
programme.desc: Ken holds a wedding ceremony in Macau for his daughter Rainbow. However, an explosion during the wedding causes Rainbow to fall into coma, while Ken and his friend Mark, are accused of engulfing some illicit money. Enraged, Ken swears to seek vengeance and pursue the mastermind who has gotten them involved in his evil plan.

programme.title: MuMu
programme.desc: Mumu, a cheerful seven-year-old girl, lives with her deaf father in a deaf community and connects him to the outside world. However, their peaceful life is disrupted when her estranged mother reappears, pushing Mumu into the hearing world. Meanwhile, her father becomes ensnared by a gang that exploits the deaf to commit crimes.

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: Customs Frontline
programme.desc: After boarding an unauthorized cargo ship and finding its entire crew dead, the Hong Kong Customs officers uncover a hidden cache of illegal weapons linked to an international conflict. As Customs officer Zhou Zheng Li and Interpol's Ying go undercover, they unveil a multinational operation with ties closer to home.

programme.title: Smashing Frank
programme.desc: Four young thieves wearing bunny masks pull off the heists targeting the rich. Calling themselves "Frank," their mission is less about money and more about exposing corruption through graffiti and viral videos. However, when they collide with a powerful church involved in a money-laundering scheme, their mission spirals into a deadly game.

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of The Way We Dance features the plight of Hong Kong's grassroots performing artists as they fight against the government's plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: The Ex-files 4: Marriage Plan
programme.desc: Two brothers, Meng Yun and Yu Fei, are of marriageable age and are facing challenges in love. Yun dodges family pressure to marry after his breakup, while Fei and his girlfriend opt for a marriage cooling-off period to tackle marriage issues.

programme.title: Romantic Dream
programme.desc: Dino meets his dream girl Mandy and falls in love with her at first sight. However, she disappears suddenly and he only sees her again after nine years, when she is already married. To overcome the pain of losing his love, Dino finds a guru with supernatural power to make him meet Mandy in his dream.

programme.title: Kungfu Stuntmen
programme.desc: Hong Kong action cinema is famous for its real kung fu moves performed by a group called Kung Fu Stuntmen. This docu-film pays tribute to the generations of kung fu stuntmen, with the crew spending over two years digging archives and interviewing many talents, including the most prominent masters like Jackie Chan, Donnie Yen and Sammo Hung.

programme.title: Ip Man 3
programme.desc: When some gangsters led by a ruthless American property developer force a school to sell their land, Ip Man fights to protect it. Subsequently, Ip Man is challenged by another Wing Chun master Zhang Tian Zhi for the Grandmaster title. Ip Man accepts the challenge for the sake of his family and disciples, and wins the duel for the title.

programme.title: Smashing Frank
programme.desc: Four young thieves wearing bunny masks pull off the heists targeting the rich. Calling themselves "Frank," their mission is less about money and more about exposing corruption through graffiti and viral videos. However, when they collide with a powerful church involved in a money-laundering scheme, their mission spirals into a deadly game.

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: Hackers have caused a large-scale cyber attack, but luckily cyber security engineer Chun, manages to fend it off with his protective firewall system. To Chun's surprise, his boss is the mastermind of the attack, and when Chun gets trapped in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Echoes Of The Thunder
programme.desc: Two half-brothers, Nam and Fire, are top racing drivers. In a racing challenge with Japanese driver Kenji, Nam causes a young racing driver to be seriously injured and is depressed. Fire stands up for Nam and decides to compete with Kenji in an illegal street car race. Who will win the race? Can Nam finally bounce back?

programme.title: May We Chat
programme.desc: Yan, Wei Wei and Yi Ji are three troubled young women from very different backgrounds who met on We Chat, a social media platform, and will do anything to escape each of their troubled lives. When Yan suddenly disappears one day, Wei Wei and Yi Ji start to track her whereabouts, only to find out shocking truths about her that were never revealed.

programme.title: Bounty Hunters
programme.desc: A group of bounty hunters, including San, Yo, Cat, Swan and Bobo, are tasked to track down the culprit of a series of bombings that have plagued an international hotel group. Unfortunately, Swan, Cat and Bobo are kidnapped by the mastermind of the bombings. Can San and Yo save them? Will the bounty hunters accomplish their mission?

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: S Storm
programme.desc: ICAC Chief Officer Luk witnesses a suspect's murder while investigating an illegal soccer gambling case, but is unable to disclose information to Chief Inspector Lau due to his code of confidentiality, thereby hindering Lau's investigation. While starting the case with mutual distrust, they end up reaching a rapport to uproot the crime syndicate.

programme.title: The Locksmith
programme.desc: Locksmith Master Shan suffers from dementia and passes on his skills to Hao Ren, who surpasses him. Detective Liu often seeks Hao Ren's help and they become good friends. When Hao Ren reunites with an old friend one day, he accidentally unfolds the truth behind Shan's wife's disappearance, leading to a chain of mysterious events.

programme.title: The Fierce Wife
programme.desc: An Zhen divorces her husband after his infidelity but faces a pivotal decision four years later - to return to her cheating husband and old life or to embark on a new life with a new love?

programme.title: The Eye 10
programme.desc: This third installment of 'The Eye' horror movie series is about the creepy adventures of a group of teenagers who summon spirits by using the ten methods outlined in a mysterious comic book while vacationing in Thailand.

programme.title: Love is Blind, Hate Too
programme.desc: Bo lost her eye sight in a serious car accident a year ago. One day, she is left alone at home when her husband is away on a work trip. An intruder enters Bo's house and takes her hostage. As Bo tries to survive his mental and psychological torture, she discovers her husband's secret which is related to the accident leading to her blindness

programme.title: A Legend
programme.desc: Archaeologist Professor Fang uncovers artifacts from a glacier expedition that resembles a jade pendant in his dream. To unveil the truth, Professor Fang leads his team to a journey into the glacier, embarking on a fantastical adventure together.

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find the-one?

programme.title: The Monkey King 3
programme.desc: Monkey King, Pigsy and Sandy escort Monk Tang to retrieve the scriptures and accidentally head into the mysterious Female Kingdom. The Queen falls in love with Monk Tang at first sight, but her advisor orders Monk Tang and his disciples to be executed. As the four attract the appearance of River Spirit, the Female Kingdom is plunged into crisis!

programme.title: Hail the Judge
programme.desc: A low level magistrate is run out of town for defending a beautiful murder suspect. Through a series of comedic events he ascends to the top rank & returns looking for revenge.

programme.title: American Dreams in China
programme.desc: During the economic reform period in the 80's, three undergraduates are brought together by a common ambition - to live the American dream.

programme.title: Mission Milano
programme.desc: A wealthy entrepreneur goes undercover with an Interpol agent to protect a new invention, the Seed of God, from falling into an international crime conglomerate.

programme.title: VR Fighter
programme.desc: Bodyguard Long Wei has posttraumatic stress disorder after his wife's death. One day, he encounters Amy who works for a VR technology firm and is invited for a new product test. After the test, Long Wei becomes the firm's VR fighter and dons the newly invented armour. However, as mysterious armed men break in, a fierce battle has just begun...

programme.title: All U Need Is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Wu Kong
programme.desc: Set 500 years before the Monkey King Wu Kong wreaks havoc in the heavenly kingdom, the movie tells the story of how Wu Kong who, unwilling to bow to his own destiny, sets out to rebel against the gods.

programme.title: The Dream Of The Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: King Gambler
programme.desc: This film was actually a lively forerunner to the gambling film craze, which eventually swept Asian cinema. Here, it's cardsharp versus cardsharp with a lot more kung-fu action, in a battle of wits and fists to become the king of the casino. The double stings and triple crosses raise in complexity and imagination until what started as an unusual box office risk became a top ten hit of 1976.

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: The Gambling Syndicate
programme.desc: A young provincial detective seeks to take down a local gambling syndicate with the help of two convicts.

programme.title: The Kingdom And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the Emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. When he sends for Li one year later, she was too ill to withstand the arduous journey and arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: The Invincible Fist
programme.desc: A dedicated chief constable nicknamed The Invincible Fist is chasing after a band of bandits near a village one day and encounters an innocent blind girl. He quickly falls in love with her, but finds out she is the daughter of a vicious bandit. Will he kill the father of his lover?

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Due to his ignorance and silly behaviour, he is seen as a joke to everyone. The warlord is finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason, bringing a befitting end to a traitor.

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: The Black Butterfly
programme.desc: Kwan leads a double life as a waitress and as an infamous outlaw skilled in martial arts, The Black Butterfly. When she steals a cache of gold from the Five Devils Rock bandits, she soon has the bandits, and the government, on her tail.

programme.title: Intimate Confessions of a Chinese Courtesan
programme.desc: Young Ai Nu is abducted and sold to the popular Four Seasons brothel run by the powerful and ruthless Madam Chun Yi. Ai Nu gets locked up in a dungeon due to her fiery attitude. Soon, a murder occurs within the brothel and a policeman must race against time to prevent a vicious revenge plot from reaching its blood-spattered conclusion.

programme.title: Martial Arts of Shaolin
programme.desc: Zhi Ming, who trains at the Northern Shaolin Temple, teams up with Si Ma Yan, who trains at the Southern Shaolin Temple, to avenge both their fathers' death by assassinating a corrupt magistrate, leading to a series of fierce battles!

programme.title: That Fiery Girl
programme.desc: The bandits of Hulu Valley slay the chief of the Mei Clan while searching for a treasure map. In retaliation, Chun from the Mei Clan infiltrates the bandit's fortress to map a way in for the authorities, but ends up falling in love with the bandit leader's daughter, Pearl. While Chun's plot is uncovered, he receives unexpected help from Pearl.

programme.title: The Avenging Eagle
programme.desc: Qi Ming Xing, an assassin of the Iron Boat Clan, decides to quit the clan. When hunted by the clan, he is saved by Swordsman Zhuo Yi Fan. Zhuo accidentally discovers that Qi is the killer of his wife, but forgives him after knowing Qi's guilt over her death. The two finally team up to destroy the evil clan.

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: Adapted from the classic Chinese novel of the same title, the story follows Monk Tang San Zang's journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing.

programme.title: Shaolin Intruders
programme.desc: On a routine courier mission, the prestigious Chief was murdered by four mysterious monks. When all evidence pointed to Ching Hua, his friend Lei decides to clear his name by barging in the Shaolin Temple thrice. When Lei thought justice was served for the culprits, he soon realizes the table had turned and the monks stroke again. What follows is a series of intense pursuit for the ultimate villain!

programme.title: Lover's Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a man's role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: Angel with the Iron Fists
programme.desc: Lo Wei directs and stars as the chief detective in this gripping thriller, playing alongside Lily Ho, who excels in the role of an undercover avenger that can fight as well as she flirts! Caught between the crime bosses known as Baldhead and Black Widow, she only has four choices: punch, kick, shoot or bombard with explosives!

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan, Madam White Bone and her sexy sister, and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: Lady With A Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman Feng tries to find a group of villains responsible for her eldest sister's death, but is shocked to discover that her fianc, Jin, is one of them. At the same time, Jin's mother and the two other killers are planning to kill Feng. Can Feng fight back and take her revenge?

programme.title: Dawn Will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parent's consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her

programme.title: Clan Feuds
programme.desc: Like legendary director Chu Yuan did so often and so successfully, Chang Peng Yi adapted this film from a story by Ku Lung. Following the footsteps of the equally legendary Chang Cheh, Chang also casted the majestic Ti Lung, along with "Venoms Lo Meng and Sun Chien, for a spectacular showcase of mystical Martial Arts World's intrigue and consummate Kung Fu.

programme.title: Hex
programme.desc: This supernatural mystery tells the story of a sickly wife and her maid conspiring to kill her beastly husband, leading to a string of events with spooky twists and turns.

programme.title: To Kill a Jaguar
programme.desc: Set in 1920s Shanghai, a village girl journeys to the big city in search of her father and meets her childhood friend Jaguar, who works for the mob boss Kam. In a world controlled by the mobs, it is a test of survival for all as Jaguar allies himself with ace gunman Ko Tang, to take over Kam's empire.

programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: In this classic romantic melodrama, nightclub songstress Qing Qing falls for the handsome Peng Nan. However, the two go through an emotional roller coaster of misunderstandings, separations and mutual torment. When the two finally fall back into love, Qing Qing receives a shocking revelation that brings the story to its inevitable sad ending.

programme.title: The Spiritual Boxer
programme.desc: One of the first kung fu comedies, this is a story about a con artist who uses kung fu to swindle villagers for money by pretending to be possessed by spirits. When they are threatened by bandits, he must use the same skills for good.

programme.title: The Long Chase
programme.desc: Governor Yan is killed and his guard Fan identifies Kou as the assassin by his signature weapon, a dart. Kou is listed as a wanted man when he enters the city, but managed to escape arrest with the help of the innkeeper's daughter. At the same time, Fan is attacked by a bandit who pretends to be Kou. What are the secret plots behind these attacks?

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the family's young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huo's stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: Heaven and Hell
programme.desc: When an angel, Ling, decides to help his two friends who have fallen in love to escape from Heaven, he is sent to live as a human on earth as his punishment. Reincarnated as a cab driver, he sacrifices his own life to save another ill-fated couple and lands in hell, where he has to face off against the ghosts and demons to fight his way out!

programme.title: My Name Ain't Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: The Black Enforcer
programme.desc: Lung the Black Enforcer is ordered to escort a murderer Fei to prison. While taking shelter in Lung's house from the snowstorm, Fei is rescued by his gang and Fei kills Lung's mother and sister before escaping. Lung is imprisoned for the failed task and after being released, he vows to avenge his family by killing Fei.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: Heroes of the East
programme.desc: A Chinese man marries a Japanese woman through an arranged marriage and manages to insult all of her Japanese martial arts family by issuing a challenge to her that is misinterpreted by the others. He must then prove how good Chinese Kung Fu really is through a series of duels with the seven Japanese martial artists who come to meet the challenge!

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: Men From The Monastery
programme.desc: At the end of the Ming Dynasty, Wu San Gui betrays his people to the Qing officials and recruits fighters from all backgrounds. Members from Wudan and Ermei are the first to yield and collude with local bullies. When they start attacking the Shaolin Monastery, its most famous disciples have to band together and fight against the enemies.

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: Honey Bunny & Plane Hijack S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Mrs. Katkar and Mr. Khanna's plane is hijacked. Upon learning about it, Honey and his team seek the help of Inspector Panda.

programme.title: Sheriff Country S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Mickey Fox, a sheriff in Edgewater and stepsister of Cal Fire's division chief Sharon Leone, must balance the demands of law enforcement with the complexities of motherhood, politics and a past that won't stay buried.

programme.title: Celebrity Family Feud S11 Ep7
programme.desc: It's singer Normani and family vs comedienne Michelle Buteau and family. Then, it's comedian Andy Richter and family vs the family of the John Ritter including actors Jason Ritter, Tyler Ritter and actress Amy Yasbeck.

programme.title: ULTRAVIOLET
programme.desc: Milla Jovovich goes from super model to super heroine in a world where vampires are on a rampage spreading diseases. She uses her powers to protect a young boy from the government, who want him dead.

programme.title: CYRIL: SIMPLY MAGIC S1 Ep6

programme.title: FANTASY ISLAND S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Tara and Jessica's High School Reunion , cat Lady - Longtime best friends, Tara and Jessica, want to rule their 30th high school reunion, Andi wants to know if her cat BoBo loves her as much as she loves him, Roarke juggles a secret romance, Ruby and Gina spend more time together.

programme.title: FANTASY ISLAND S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Hurricane Helene , the Bachelor Party - In the wake of her mother's passing, Helene visits the island in search of her biological father, Roarke and Javier grow closer, Ruby gives herself a spiritual cleanse with a bonfire and a night swim, where she encounters an old friend.

programme.title: BOSTON BLUE S1 Ep9

Once in Boston, he is paired with detective Lena Peters, the eldest daughter of a prominent law enforcement family.

programme.title: RAINMAKER, THE S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Up against Sarah, Rudy wonders if she's still the woman he once knew and loved.

programme.title: HELLBOY
programme.desc: This supernatural action-adventure is based on Mike Mignola's acclaimed Dark Horse Comics series. Brought to Earth by evil genius Rasputin (Karel Roden) to aid the Nazis in their dying cause, Hellboy (Ron Perlman) was rescued by Professor Broom (John Hurt), founder of the clandestine B.P.R.D. (Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense), who raised him and developed his extraordinary paranormal gifts. Despite his dark origins, Hellboy becomes an unlikely champion for good, battling the evil forces that threaten our world along with a telepathic mer-man (Doug Jones) and a pyro-kinetic (Selma Blair). Hidden from the society they are assigned to protect, they are the key line of defense against Rasputin, who seeks to reclaim Hellboy to the dark side and use his powers to bring about Armageddon.

programme.desc: Why Raeliana Was Called A Barbarian - Raeliana rescues a bird in front of High Priest Heika, who says it is destined to die. They end up having an argument.

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Kara And Shiki / Mega Marble Mania Madness / Scramble Scrap Squad - Dressed in a miko's outfit, Nico and Kuku are helping out Kara's father, who is the head priest at a shrine. While helping out, Nico uses the spell Ani-snippy from shide paper, and creates a moving paper cat. Kara also wanted to create a flying bird, but the shape didn't come out too well and couldn't take flight. But the shape she cut out was so terrible that it looks like a shikigami and ended up creating a life?

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Letter From A Friend - Morihito was cleaning his room, and found a letter that Nico wrote to him when they were children. To Moi, I will always be your friend. Morihito had it pinned to the wall for five years and looked at it almost every day and got cheered up by it. It was the death anniversary for Morihito's mother, so he went to visit her grave. Meanwhile, Nico, Kanshi, Keigo, Miharu, and Nemu who was visiting, were listening to a story of Nico and Morihito's childhood days.

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep20
programme.desc: The Lost Wolf And The Stray Cat - Keigo can't use his immense strength unless he looks at a crescent shape. Nico sees that Keigo is sad, so she asks him to become the user for a ring that has flying magic sealed inside. If he can come to utilize it, he should be able to wield it as a weapon, so Keigo begins his training. One day, in the middle of training, Nemu visits and talks to him.

programme.title: Oshi No Ko S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Pressure - B-Komachi is set for Japan Idol Fest but must decide who will be the center, with Ruby and Memcho pushing for Kana, the best singer.

programme.title: Grand Blue S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Doubles - Iori and the others dream about going diving at a beautiful location after seeing an article on Miyakojima in a magazine. However, Tokita and Kotobuki decide the club is going to join a tennis doubles match! They explain that they're joining the match to get everyone to build trust with their diving buddy, but the real reason is to get back at the tennis club and take away their prize money!

programme.title: Grand Blue S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Men's Cocktails - The members of the diving team start working part-time jobs to pay for their trip to Okinawa. However, Iori and Kohei end up spending all their earnings on drinking. Meanwhile, Kotobuki is working hard as a bartender, and his boss lets Iori and Kohei try it out too. However, these two idiots don't know how to make cocktails, and end up creating some dangerous new drinks!

programme.title: Grand Blue S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Truth Or Dare - Iori tries to setup another mixer for his friends, and wants to ask Chisa to introduce her friends so they can all play truth or dare. Nanaka and Azusa also get involved, and they all begin a vicious game of attack and defense! However, Iori doesn't have enough money for their trip. Iori and the gang head to a diving shop to buy diving gear, but find out there's still a lot they don't know.

programme.desc: The team goes to a college campus with a world-class observatory to discover who is using the Crystal of Dr. John Dee to steal people's memories, in order to own the future.

programme.title: Decoys
programme.desc: Luke and Roger are just another couple of college guys trying to lose their virginity. But when Luke sees something unusual, he begins to suspect that the girls on campus aren't exactly human.

programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.desc: Every district in the nation of Panem must send a boy and girl to fight to the death in the annual Hunger Games competition. Jennifer Lawrence is 16-year-old Katniss Everdeen, who volunteers to take her younger sister's place in the games.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
programme.desc: Katniss Everdeen has returned home safe after winning the 74th Annual Hunger Games. She senses that a rebellion is simmering, but the Capitol is still very much in control as the next Hunger Games is prepareda competition that could change Panem forever.

programme.title: Seattle Superstorm
programme.desc: When a massive storm threatens the Pacific Northwest, a family must find each other and work together to put a stop to the storm before it spreads beyond their control and annihilates the planet!

programme.title: Backdraft
programme.desc: Two firefighter brothers clash while battling deadly arsons in Chicago. With explosive action and a gripping mystery, Backdraft stars Kurt Russell, William Baldwin, and Robert De Niro.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay Part 1
programme.desc: The worldwide phenomenon continues. Katniss (Jennifer Lawrence) has survived and destroyed the Hunger Games, and now rises with District 13 to fight against President Snow (Donald Sutherland).

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay Part 2
programme.desc: With the nation of Panem in a full scale war, Katniss confronts President Snow in the final showdown.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Chappie tells the story of a robot imbued with artificial intelligence who is stolen by two local gangsters who want to use him for their own nefarious purposes.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
programme.desc: Katniss Everdeen has returned home safe after winning the 74th Annual Hunger Games. She senses that a rebellion is simmering, but the Capitol is still very much in control as the next Hunger Games is prepareda competition that could change Panem forever.

programme.title: Transcendence
programme.desc: A brilliant but controversial research scientist becomes obsessed with his quest to create a humanistic machine, leading to a dangerous conclusion.

programme.title: Change In The Air
programme.desc: When a beguiling young woman moves in next door, a quiet neighborhood is awakened, bringing people face to face with their secrets and, ultimately, themselves.

programme.title: The Legend Of Zorro
programme.desc: Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Alejandro de la Vega (Banderas) - and his wife, Elena (Zeta-Jones) - to take action.

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: After chimps infected with a deadly rage virus are freed, a global pandemic nearly wipes out humanity. A small group of survivors, led by Jim (Cillian Murphy), must navigate desolate London and find hope amidst the chaos.

programme.title: 3:10 To Yuma
programme.desc: Dan is a struggling rancher who volunteers to safely deliver Ben Wade, the captured leader of a gang of thieves, to a train station where the 3:10 to Yuma will transport him to trial. Ben's gang of cutthroats and robbers has other plans.

programme.title: Change In The Air
programme.desc: When a beguiling young woman moves in next door, a quiet neighborhood is awakened, bringing people face to face with their secrets and, ultimately, themselves.

programme.title: The World's End
programme.desc: In "The World's End", Simon Pegg and Nick Frost reunite for an epic pub crawl that turns into a fight for humanity's future. Director Edgar Wright delivers a hilarious mix of nostalgia, comedy, and sci-fi thrills.

programme.title: Nim's Island
programme.desc: Nim is adventure author Alex Rover's number one fan and she lives on an isolated island with her scientist father. When her father is lost at sea and the island is being invaded, she convinces the agoraphobic and a germaphobe author to come and help.

programme.title: Elysium
programme.desc: In the year 2154, two classes of people exist: the very wealthy, who live on a pristine man-made space station called Elysium, and the rest, who live on an overpopulated, ruined Earth.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Deion Sanders - The retired footballer travels to the southern Utah desert after his kids accuse him of softness. They hike through the desert, but Deion's fear of snakes causes problems when they encounter one in the wild.

programme.title: Patrick Aryee's Wild World S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jaguar - Biologist Patrick Aryee is in Costa Rica to witness the annual mass nesting of sea turtles, as well as the predatory jaguars that come in for the kill.

programme.title: Big Adventures: Into the Gobi Desert with Nick Knowles S1 Ep3
programme.desc: In the final instalment of Nick Knowles' Big Adventure in Mongolia, Nick leaves the desert sands of the Gobi and the dramatic peaks of the West to travel to Mongolia's capital, Ulaanbaatar.

programme.title: Ancient Powers S1 Ep6
programme.desc: End Game - Our ancient powers have endured for centuries but destruction is close at hand. What will cause their downfall? And who will create a lasting legacy?

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Deion Sanders - The retired footballer travels to the southern Utah desert after his kids accuse him of softness. They hike through the desert, but Deion's fear of snakes causes problems when they encounter one in the wild.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Wales - Travel along the west coast of Great Britain, where the world's longest uninterrupted footpath forges through more than 800 miles of breathtaking scenery. This majestic coast teems with wildlife, geological mysteries, and centuries of human history.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Brought Back from the Brink - Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bat's teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S1 Ep2
programme.desc: A Koala Called Cavendish - Watch senior vet Tim tutor new recruit Phil through an injured koala checkup, and track the team's solutions for animals plagued by the summer heat. Celebrate as vet Karina solves a puzzling frog case and releases an old friend who's ready to fly.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Spiky and Stinky - Check out vet Phil's clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinic's favorite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew who's the catch of the day.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Spoonbill Soft Shoe Shuffle - Join the team's scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey who's having seizures. Scale a tree with rescuer Jo to net a wounded lizard, see kookaburra feather-implant surgery, and admire a spoonbill's new corrective shoes.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Brisbane Floods - Wade into recovery mode as the clinic deals with the animal aftermath of a Brisbane flood. Meet a baby kangaroo in need of round-the-clock care and a plover washed down a drain. Then size up the turtle waiting list that vet Karina patiently tackles.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Macro Mozambique - The coast of Mozambique is home to giants, like humpbacks and whale sharks, but the tiniest species play just as big of a role in the ecosystem. Meet the scientists who are working against the clock to protect coastal creatures big and small.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Life in the Food Chain - The ocean sprawls across 70 percent of our planet and is home to as many as one million known species of plants and animals. However, it is the smallest of ocean creatures that underpins the world's largest food web - plankton. These microscopic organisms drift through the ocean's diverse habitats, triggering feeding cycles in their wake. Without them, life in the ocean would cease to exist.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Waters S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Oceans - Dive to the darkest depths of the sea to uncover the ocean's most mysterious inhabitants. Journey across vast stretches of open water with humpback whales, then wander down to the ocean floor to witness breathtaking bioluminescence.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Waters S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Coasts - Venture along Earth's coasts, where colliding worlds create a melting pot of biodiversity. Watch orcas hunt with precision, hold on as guillemot chicks take leaps of faith, crawl to safety with turtle hatchlings, and see crabs sculpt sandy galaxies.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Mountains - Climb into a realm of thin air and towering rock. Tag along as mythical monkeys battle for a winter food stash, sing along with lemurs in a fruit-filled tree canopy, and watch an aromatic tree bring together blossom and possum in a moonlit tryst.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Boreal - Travel to the Arctic for a peek at the brutal challenges of life in the boreal forest, then admire some stellar animal adaptations. Witness a secret reindeer superpower, navigate a rodent labyrinth of snow, and learn why moose are gourmets at heart.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Extreme - Learn how plants and animals tough it out in some of the driest terrain Earth has to offer. Run across thirsty trees that act as elephant signposts, see insects team up with plants for a chance at life, and get insight into natural chemical warfare.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Macro Mozambique - The coast of Mozambique is home to giants, like humpbacks and whale sharks, but the tiniest species play just as big of a role in the ecosystem. Meet the scientists who are working against the clock to protect coastal creatures big and small.

programme.title: Animal Senses S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Hearing - Sound waves are produced by movement. Animals have evolved organs to detect those sound waves in the air or water to perceive movements in their environment. These are some of the animals that have mastered the sense of hearing.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Einstein Rules - Come full circle as the dry season descends and the Waterfront Pride enjoys good hunting and renewed confidence in their territory. Then celebrate the success of former outsider Einstein, who gets down to business as the king of his very own pride.

programme.title: After The Wildfires
programme.desc: Examine fire's pivotal role in shaping Australia's natural world. Tour the devastation left by 2020's brutal bush-fire season, learn how climate change fuelled this watershed event, and chart the long-term recovery of the continent's wildlife.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Reptile Runabout - Weave through Queensland's coastal chaos, where Jess faces her fears chasing a lace monitor lizard up a tree with an active beehive. Watch Stu cut a trapped eastern brown out of a fence and see Mick hunt a slippery python for terrified homeowners.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Hot and Bothered - Dive into tight spaces, underneath hot houses, and into tense rescue situations as the catchers confront a six-foot-long, highly venomous brown snake. Then watch Stu and Liv relocate a coastal python threatening the safety of a homeowner's pets.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Penguin Proposal - Watch an Antarctic gentoo penguin pop the question with a rocky token of his devotion, then learn how a Madagascar lemur uses toxic millipedes for pest control. Bone up on makeup techniques with a flamingo and meet a honey badger that can pick locks.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep2
programme.desc: House Hunting Hermit Crabs - Get in line with hermit crabs for an orderly shell exchange on a Belize beach, then meet a Senegalese chimp's pet genet. Float with an otter who swaps hostages for free meals and admire the agricultural prowess of leafcutter ants in the rainforest.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Punks Strike Back - After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Fly Free - Observe vet Karina's fight to save a koala mauled by dogs, then face the clinic's toughest customer with vet Tim: a rainbow lorikeet who's quick to bite. Scoop up a peeved possum with rescuer Chantel and bond with Meaghan over a gaggle of goslings.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Einstein Rules - Come full circle as the dry season descends and the Waterfront Pride enjoys good hunting and renewed confidence in their territory. Then celebrate the success of former outsider Einstein, who gets down to business as the king of his very own pride.

programme.title: Animal Senses S1 Ep5

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Chasing Scales - Storm into a new suburb, where the wranglers keep deadly snakes from slipping into family homes. Watch as Stu and Liv pull an eastern brown from a job site, Jess and Dan expel a python from a shed, and Mick and Adele evict a red belly from a bedroom.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Home Invasion - Respond to danger on a rural property with Mick and Adele, who brave a fired-up brown snake. Tread carefully as Jess and Dan extract a python from a play area, and get spooked when a chicken-hunting python squashes Liv's hand during a tense rescue.

programme.title: Chasing The Rains S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Praying for Rain - Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenix's search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Inside Story - Look behind the scenes and meet the innovative teams working to preserve and protect Kenya's wildlife. Check out Save the Elephants' radio-tracking-collar system, a drone that monitors wild dog packs, and a local team of Maasai cheetah trackers.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Hollywoods Held Hostage - During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Queen of Yala - The shadowy forests of Yala National Park are the perfect hideout for secretive leopards. It's time for one young female, Asha, to strike out alone. Join her as she fights for her own territory, finds a mate, and becomes a mother.

programme.title: Jason Atherton's Dubai Dishes S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Series 2, Episode 7 - Jason is in the Dubai Marina as he explores food that looks so good it goes viral.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby S6 Ep2
programme.desc: Argos in Cappadocia - Rob and Monica make the journey to Turkey to work at a hotel built into a network of caves, where modern luxury meets ancient history and every room comes with its own surprises.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Liam and Hannah's Shepherd's Hut - Situated in a water meadow in north Dorset, rare breed farmers Liam and Hannah's 1930s shepherd's hut was bought for just 5 almost 40 years ago. Simon and the team help them to restore it.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Faith's Geodome - Simon and the team go to Devon where camp site owner Faith wants to create a unique property using an invention of her late father's. Faith wants the B&B's rooms to have a celestial theme.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off: Christmas Specials: 2023 S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Great New Year Bake Off - Familiar faces from Bake Off past - Maxy, Jrgen, Maggie and Mark - battle it out to win the first Star Baker of 2024, before seeing the New Year in with a performance from Bone-Afide.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Series 2, Episode 3 - Rick meets Springwatch presenter and biologist Gillian Burke, who takes Rick on a walk through a rare habitat called an Atlantic temperate rainforest on the banks of the Helford River.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Cooking for Less S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Series 1, Episode 6 - Jamie demonstrates how to make a tasty hot pot just using just root vegetables and later cooks up succulent sticky BBQ chicken, corn and slaw. On a drive to stay veggie, Jamie makes veggie enchiladas and guest, Georgina Hayden, makes veggie spinach and tomato rice.

programme.title: Nigella's Amsterdam Christmas
programme.desc: Nigella travels to Amsterdam to enjoy the festivities in the Venice of the North. Nigella visits her favourite places, picks up ingredients for her festive feast and makes traditional Dutch speculaas.

programme.title: Grand Designs S21 Ep9
programme.desc: Henley 2024 - Tony and Ara want to create a house of healing dedicated to health and wellbeing, in a beautiful woodland clearing near Henley-on-Thames. But the site is fraught with emotional landmines...

programme.title: The Great Australian Bake Off S6 Ep2
programme.desc: Biscuit Week - Our amateur bakers bid to win a biscuit war with their Signature fondant biscuits, delicious Peanut & Choc Chip Explosive Wheels, and a spectacular Biscuit Game.

programme.desc: Bangalore - Luke Nguyen circumnavigates southern India, discovering the sounds, colours and cuisines of the region, meeting local cooks and chefs.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S1 Ep7
programme.desc: He Blinded Me With Science - Julien teams up with Timo, the tenrec, a scientist who the King elists to automate everything in the kingdom.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Viva Mort - When Julien embarrasses Maurice, he tries to make up for his transgression, while Mort inadvertently joins an anti-King Julien group.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Uniconned - Jun breaks the rules by sneaking a small, adorable dragon out of the Crystal Realm and bringing it home, but finds that her older brother, Eugene, has arrived and watches her every move.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Magma Breather - Tom has to keep his mom, Olivia, distracted while Jun, Alex, and D'Angelo use a new dragon to close off a cave leading to the Crystal Realm, and prevent her from discovering the dragons.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 Ep13
programme.desc: End of the Dragon Master - Po, the kids, and the new Panda Guardians must work together to defeat Jindiao once and for all, and get a visit from an unlikely source

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Journey to the East - Feeling a little bored with their new hero life, Po and the kids are excited to accept an important invitation to the Forbidden City. Meanwhile, there's a curious disturbance deep in Panda Village...

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Skeleton Town - The townspeople are so terrified when Puss brings the skeleton army back to San Lorenzo that they ignore Uli's sad attempts at being evil and scary.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S2 Ep40
programme.desc: Familiar Feeling - When Puss discovers the coveted Crown of Souls gemstone was split into three pieces for three witch sisters, he finds Malviola and asks for her stone

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Please Hold for the Next Representative - Yi and the crew are overrun with pings from humans who are frustrated by creatures they now live alongside. Just when they think they've solved one issue, another springs up - and then that original one pops up again too! Meanwhile, we see an ominous pedestal of light progressively become more cracked with each fraught human-creature relationship. At her wits' end, Yi accidentally hurts Peng, Jin, and Everest with her magic. She then notices Everest fading into nothing

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Please Hold While We Connect You - In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy. Feeling responsible, Yi embarks on a dangerous mission to save everyone - but it's the community of creatures and humans alike that instead come to Yi's rescue. Together, they realize that their connections to one another are the most powerful magic of all.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Game Show - It's Game Show Day in the dollhouse! Our wily and well-groomed host, CatRat, leads Gabby and Pandy around the dollhouse, where they compete in Gab-ified games, like Tushy Tunes on the butt xylophone couch and a cooking competition of Bakey with Cakey. They win tickets and trade them in for prizes at the end.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Kitty Pirates - Gabby unboxes a pirate treasure map in the shape of the dollhouse (a piece of it has been torn off). This must mean it's time for a pirate treasure hunt in the dollhouse! Pirate Gabby and Pirate Pandy head out on their journey across the many lands of the dollhouse to find the Gabby Cats Treasure!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep10
programme.desc: MerCat Gets Her Sparkle Back - When Gabby unboxes beakers filled with a magical potion, they conjure up an invite for Spa Day at the dollhouse! However, while decorating for MerCat's favorite day of the year, MerCat accidentally loses her color and sparkle. Gabby and Pandy must help her get her sparkle back for the big Spa Day party!

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Growing Paints - When Grug thinks his forehead looks too big in Ugga's family portrait, she strives to make the painting disappear.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Cave New World - When the adults exclude the kids from their adult-only cave, the kids make their own much cooler cave, soon making the adults want to switch caves.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Thunk Tank - When a freak lightning strike turns Thunk into a genius, Phil is thrilled to have someone likeminded on the farm, until the farm residents start asking Thunk for help with problems on the farm instead of him.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep24
programme.desc: The Decoy - Tom's leadership abilities come into question by Eugene when his decisions lead to failure while attempting to confront Buzzsaw.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep25
programme.desc: The Night Lights: Part 1 - Tom and Thunder discover a baby Nightlight and must bring him back to Thunder's home realm.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep26
programme.desc: The Night Lights: Part 2 - When Thunder's clan of fellow Nightlights is attacked by the Snow Wraith, Tom vows to rescue them.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep28
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Angry Abnormal Atrocities of the Astute Animal Agressors - Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep29
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Abysmal Altercation of the Abominable Altitooth - Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep30
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Bout of the Beastly Barfilisk - Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Fugitive's Day Out - Boss Baby is framed for leaking info about the Stinkless Serum to PuppyCo and must flee on the run via Errand Day with the family

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S1 Ep18

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Bout of the Beastly Barfilisk - Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.desc: Last Auction Heroes - When the Riders uncover the location of Viggo's Dragon Auction, they must stop him from selling dragons and stealing all the gold in Berk.

programme.desc: Defenders Of The Wing Part 1 - The Defenders of the Wing are a local island tribe, which worships dragons and believe the Riders have stolen their protector - the Eruptodon dragon.

programme.desc: Defender Of All Universes - The Paladins face the most epic battle yet

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods S2 Ep52
programme.desc: This Is An End Part 1 & 2 - With a big meteorite headed straight for Ahhh! Valley, Grug gathers a team to try and stop the rock before it destroys the valley while Ugga takes the rest of the family to go do the one thing they've always wanted to do in Ahhh! Valley before they evacuate

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S2 Ep52
programme.desc: Lucky and the New Frontier (Part 2) - While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that there's no place like home.

programme.title: Dinotrux S2 Ep27
programme.desc: Sawmetrodon - Ty, Revvit and the crew save a band of Woodland Reptools from an evil and destructive Sawmetradon named Splitter who refuses to join the Trux team.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Time to Be Quiet, a Time to Be Loud - Raa Raa has spotted an exciting new thing in the jungle. What could it be? As they try to get close to the "flappy fly", Raa Raa discovers that some situations call for absolute quiet not something our noisy little lion is very good at!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Right Sound - One of the pipes on Huffty's Toot Stick has broken. Can Raa Raa help his friend find the "right" sound to replace it in the jungle so they can play loud music together?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Huffty Loses His Voice - Huffty has lost his voice. While Raa Raa and his friends try and work out what has happened to it, Huffty has to mime to make himself understood.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Raa Raa Finds A Voice - Raa Raa is upset when Topsy suggests that he should stick to doing "Raa Raa" things. He sets out to prove Topsy wrong. Will the noisy little lion learn that sometimes it's best just to be yourself?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Zebby's Snack Time - Zebby likes to have a snack when she is feeling tired. Raa Raa thinks this is a great idea and decides to join his friend. Except he thinks they should have their snack in the perfect place but everywhere they try is just too noisy I wonder why that could be?!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Finding Noisy - Raa Raa gets carried away when collecting fun noisy objects in the jungle with his friends. Raa Raa wants to keep everything he finds for himself, but soon discovers that his collection isn't much fun with nobody to share it with.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Kitty Rangers - Kitty Ranger Team Leader Mama Box helps Kitty Ranger Gabby and Pandy get a lost Baby Me-Owl back home to its Mama in the Fairy Tale Garden. They embark on a hiking adventure! They learn about animal tracking, earn patches along the way, and ultimately, reunite Baby with Mama!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Meow-Mazing Games - When Gabby, Pandy, and Carlita prepare for the annual Meow-Mazing Games, they encounter stiff competition from the Doodads and must work together to bring home the coveted dollhouse trophy.

programme.title: Tip And Oh: Home For The Holidays S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tip And Oh: Home For The Holidays - Oh takes it upon himself to introduce Christmas joy to his fellow Boovs. Unfortunately, his well-meaning mission nearly destroys the city.

programme.title: SPIRIT OF CHRISTMAS (RIDING FREE) S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Spirit Of Christmas - Lucky and friends must figure out how to get home in time for Christmas when a falling boulder -- and a serious snowstorm -- derail their travel plans.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Christmas Bonus S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Boss Baby: Christmas Bonus - When Boss Baby accidentally gets mistaken for an elf and sent to the North Pole on Christmas Eve, he mobilizes unpaid elf workers against an old nemesis: that charity-loving hippie people call Santa Claus. Meanwhile, Tim races to the North Pole to get his baby brother back home in time for Templeton Family Christmas traditions.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Xtreme Xploits of the Xplosive Xmas S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Xtreme Xploits of the Xplosive Xmas Special - George and Harold love Christmas, but they feel like it could use some upgrades. So they make a comic about a new version of the holiday: BLISSMAS. Instead of red bows, laser shows! Instead of ugly sweaters, cool capes! Instead of decorating trees, creating tree-bots! The boys take Melvin's time toad back to convince Santa to incorporate some of their ideas to his new holiday. But they come back to the present to find that their plan didn't work quite how they'd hoped. George and Harold realize they need to help Santa remember the true meaning of Christmas before it's gone forever!
