programme.desc: The Crew Builds Library Treasure Tunnels / The Crew Builds A Super Snack Dispenser - Rubble & Crew's favorite book series has new additions! But when there's no room for them in the library, the pups have to get creative. The pups have a surprise just for Rubble... a snack dispenser!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep306
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Giant Turtle House - It's Friend Appreciation Day! But when Speed Meister's gift for Mr. McTurtle goes awry, he has to call Rubble & Crew for help.

programme.title: DORA S3 Ep310
programme.desc: Dora Saves Christmas / Return to Snowy Mountain - Dora helps Santa get his sleigh back from Swiper and deliver presents to everyone in the rainforest. Dora saves Christmas!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S8 Ep811
programme.desc: The Super Snowman Contest - It's a snow day in Axle City, and Blaze and AJ are competing in the Super Snowman Contest! But when a giant snowball rolls them away, Blaze and AJ must brave the elements to make it back in time to win!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep124
programme.desc: Barbazoo Can't Say ''No'' / The Doppelganger - Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores.

programme.title: A PAW Patrol Christmas
programme.desc: Rubble can't wait for Christmas to come as he's looking forward to Santa bringing him a Lazer Drill. Mayor Humdinger learns that Santa has come down with a cold.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Present / Movie / Vinny - Tim, Tommy and Tia can't decide on the best gift for Grandma. Tim tries to make his own Captain DinoStar movie. Tim fakes it to prove he's just as cool as Kai's cousin.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep301
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Vet Clinic - When the traveling veterinarian Dr. Diwa can't finish all her checkups in Builder Cove in time, Rubble & Crew know just what to do.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep219
programme.desc: The Crew Makes Christmas Magical - It's Christmas Eve and Rubble & Crew gets a call from Santa Claus... he needs help to build all of the toys in time for Christmas! Speed Meister overhears and tries to be the construction hero

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep209
programme.desc: Emily Elephant - There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep210
programme.desc: George's Friend - George and Rebecca Rabbit's little brother Richard each have a toy dinosaur but they are not very good at sharing their toys. Mummy Pig shows them that they can have much more fun at the playground .

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep211
programme.desc: The Boat Pond - Peppa and her family and friends are playing at the pond with their toy boats. Everyone has a boat to play with except Rebecca Rabbit. Daddy Pig makes Rebecca a boat out of newspaper.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep212
programme.desc: Mr Scarecrow - The birds keep eating the seeds from Grandpa Pig's flower garden. Peppa and George make a scarecrow, which stops the birds from eating.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep213
programme.desc: The Time Capsule - Peppa and her school friends are making a time capsule. They each put one of their favourite things inside and bury it in the school garden.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep226
programme.desc: The Mountain Eater / The First Day Of School - Barbapapa tells the Barbababies about his extraordinary encounter with a wolf. Tomorrow is the Barbababies' first day of school.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep112
programme.desc: The Cave Barbapapas - The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Double Booked / Bogweed / Prizes - Tim tries to be at two parties at once. Tim tries to find a bogweed free snack for Kai. After losing again and again, Tia tries to win every party game.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S8 Ep811
programme.desc: The Super Snowman Contest - It's a snow day in Axle City, and Blaze and AJ are competing in the Super Snowman Contest! But when a giant snowball rolls them away, Blaze and AJ must brave the elements to make it back in time to win!

programme.title: A PAW Patrol Christmas
programme.desc: Rubble can't wait for Christmas to come as he's looking forward to Santa bringing him a Lazer Drill. Mayor Humdinger learns that Santa has come down with a cold.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S2 Ep223
programme.desc: Pups Save a Snowboard Competition - Jake and Everest are excited for the Snowboard Competition, until they see the course is buried under a blanket of snow.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep219
programme.desc: The Crew Makes Christmas Magical - It's Christmas Eve and Rubble & Crew gets a call from Santa Claus... he needs help to build all of the toys in time for Christmas! Speed Meister overhears and tries to be the construction hero

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep313
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Mega Stunt Ramp / The Crew Builds A Giant Solar Farm - Rubble & Crew use their giant trucks to make awesome stunt ramps when Mega Meister challenges Mayor Greatway to a stunt competition.

programme.title: DORA S3 Ep310
programme.desc: Dora Saves Christmas / Return to Snowy Mountain - Dora helps Santa get his sleigh back from Swiper and deliver presents to everyone in the rainforest. Dora saves Christmas!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep209
programme.desc: Call Me Billiam / The Finship Trap - When Rayna asks William to be more responsible, he sets out to become a grownup fishy named Billiam. Baby discovers Hank and Goldie aren't speaking to each other.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep210
programme.desc: Shark House Rock / Toothpaste Tumble - Baby Shark helps Mommy find the perfect musical instrument to play in their family band. Daddy is embarrassed after Grandpa and Baby post a funny video of him on ChewTube.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep214
programme.desc: Recycling - Peppa and George help Mummy Pig tidy up the breakfast things. Mummy Pig tells them that bottles go into a special green box to be recycled. Old newspapers go in a red box and tins go in a blue box.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep215
programme.desc: Daddy Pig's Office - Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pig's office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbit's job is all about numbers, Mrs Cat's job is all about drawing shapes on the computer.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep216
programme.desc: Pirate Island - Grandpa and Granny Pig are taking Peppa, George and their friends to Pirate Island. Grandpa shows how to use his metal detector to find treasures and they all build a big sandcastle.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep217
programme.desc: Jumble Sale - Peppa's playgroup is holding a jumble sale to raise money for a new roof and Madame Gazelle asks everyone to bring something to sell.

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Fishing Cats - Andy, Jen and Scout head to the tropical island of Sri Lanka in Southern Asia on a global adventure in search of fishing cats.

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Andy and the Pallas's Cats - Andy, Jen and Scout embark on a global adventure to Mongolia in eastern Asia to uncover the mystery of moving rocks. Along the way, they meet a family of Pallas's cats.

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Magyarosaurus & Reeds - Andy travels back 70 million years to meet the miniature magyarosaurus, but when he arrives on their prehistoric island home he has to hide from a giant flying reptile.

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Paraceratherium & Skin - Andy meets the largest mammal ever to walk the earth in prehistoric Mongolia.

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Gigantoraptor & Tumbleweed - When the museum's prized prehistoric tumbleweed goes missing, Andy Day heads back 85 million years in time to try and find some more. During his search he helps a mother dinosaur protect her nest.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Andy and the Baby Kangaroos - In this episode Andy, Jen and Scout head to Australia on a baby animal mission to solve the mystery of why a group of kangaroos, and their joeys, are living on a beach. Along the way, Andy is chased by a pack of dingoes and hops to safety with the baby kangaroos.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Andy and the Baby Dusky Leaf Monkey - Andy, Jen and Scout head to Malaysia, South East Asia on a baby animal mission to find out why new born dusky leaf monkeys look so different to their parents.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Andy and the Tiger Cubs - Andy, Jen and Scout head to the Bandhavgarh tiger reserve in India on a baby animal mission to track down a female tiger and her new born cubs. Along the way, our team outwit a sloth that strays dangerously close to the den where the cubs are resting.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep54
programme.desc: Parcel Puzzle - When Violet tells Monty that a problem is too big for a little boy to solve, he wonders if only big people can solve big problems.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep23
programme.desc: It's Time for a Harvest Festival - JoJo and Gran Gran join Julie at the farm for the harvest festival. Julie gives JoJo, Gran Gran and their friends a special tractor ride to the harvesting field, where there's lots for everyone to do.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep22
programme.desc: It's Time for a Canal Walk - JoJo and Gran Gran are enjoying a canal walk when they meet Ned and Monty, who need some help - Ned has lost the lock key, causing a canal traffic jam. It's time for a Gran Gran plan.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep35
programme.desc: Tummy Talk - When Sarah forgets her sandwich, her rumbling tummy inadvertently starts a conversation with a Frog.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep34
programme.desc: Toggle Tangle - After Sarah helps Scarf Lady prepare the wool for her new roof, she settles down for a dreamy sleep.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep15
programme.desc: First Day on Sodor! - Darcy the tunnel boring machine makes some mistakes on her first day, but she soon makes up for it when everyone sees what she can really do.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep38
programme.desc: Double Babysitter - When Uncle Rad and Frisky accidentally turn up to babysit Bluey and Bingo on the same night, they have to work together to make Bluey feel better about babysitter put-downs.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Bad Mood - Bingo is playing Bad Mood with Dad, standing on his feet as Dad stomps around the house, controlling everything Bingo does and causing chaos.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep40
programme.desc: Octopus - When Chloe tries to teach her dad to improvise and play Bluey's game of Octopus at home, he finds it hard to understand or enjoy, until they both realize they can play it their own way.

programme.title: Supertato S2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Tato Team - During the Veggies' Super Sidekick Costume Contest, Evil Pea traps Supertato in a jar of honey. All is lost until the Veggies become real super sidekicks, the Tato Team!

programme.desc: The Fashion Badge - Duggee's uniform is a bit old and needs to be updated. Duggee can make his own clothes!

programme.desc: The Glasses Badge - When Mole was young he wanted to be a Stunt Mole! Can Duggee and the squirrels help make his dreams come true?

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won't find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes, instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today's world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk, Challenging perceptions.

programme.desc: Spotlight on East Asia, a region steeped in history and now helping to write the future of our world. We'll break down the key stories and explain why they matter.

programme.title: The Gen-Z Rebels S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Gen-Z Rebels - Why meet the Gen Z protestors across Bangladesh, Nepal, Philippines and Indonesia to understand their sense of grievance to understand why they believe that businesses and governments serve the few.

programme.title: Asia Tonight
programme.desc: CNA correspondents bring you the top stories of the day with 'live' reports and interviews to keep you up-to-date on the day's events.

programme.title: Limitless S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Season 2 continues to shine a spotlight on Asian youth below the age of 20 who are fighting for the right to pursue their passions despite the challenges they're facing in life, be it poverty, physical disabilities or their place in society.

programme.title: Singapore Tonight
programme.desc: From business to politics, health to technology, the latest news from Singapore and analysis of the impact.

programme.title: The Long Path to Gender Equality S1 Ep4001
programme.desc: Forty years ago, Akamatsu Ryoko, a visionary woman advocated for the passage of Japan's Equal Employment Opportunity Act. Now, a new generation continues the fight for gender equality.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: DOSUKOI Sumo Salon S1 Ep5001
programme.desc: This time we break down "kimedashi," a power move where a rikishi locks their opponent's arms and marches them out of the ring. We analyze technique, style, and the risks of the maneuver.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN Highlights S1 Ep2070
programme.desc: We explore Osaka, a prefecture known for its great cuisine. We meet a couple who fish for daggertooth pike conger (hamo), which taste great in summer, a farmer growing juicy eggplants, and much more.

programme.title: Rockie and Her Friends S1 Ep4034
programme.desc: Puppet action show for children. In a distant post-human future where surviving creatures have formed a community, new-breed dinosaur girl Rockie sets out on hilarious adventures with her schoolmates.

programme.title: u&i S1 Ep4036
programme.desc: This show for kids promotes a greater understanding for people with difficulties and helps develop empathy. With the help of two fairies, the main character thinks about what can be done to help.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: J-MELO S1 Ep2004
programme.desc: Join May J. for music from Chameleon Lime Whoopiepie (getting international attention for their free-spirited style) and vocalist Suzuhana Yuko, who fuses rock with traditional Japanese instruments.

programme.title: Little Charo S1 Ep6116
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 2-14.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini S1 Ep6032
programme.desc: Konnyaku is an important element of Japanese cuisine. It offers various health benefits and is drawing international attention. We learn about the many uses of this surprising superfood.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan S1 Ep6045
programme.desc: A cat patrols the rice fields, but there's always time for a mid-day nap. At a vineyard, we get a tour from a cat named Pinot Noir! He's popular with visitors but always plays it cool.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: EKIBEN JAPAN S1 Ep3025
programme.desc: The carefully made Kareigawa Bento, featuring local Kagoshima cuisine, is sold at a wooden train station more than 120 years old, which tells the story of people brought together by the ekiben.

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini S1 Ep6024
programme.desc: Discover the unique, traditional method of roof thatching that uses Hinoki cypress bark.

programme.title: Easy Japanese for Work S1 Ep2078
programme.desc: Today: asking someone to repeat and clarify. Do Cong Uan, from Vietnam, works at a metalworking company. In a roleplay challenge, he must ask a superior to repeat and clarify what they said.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life S1 Ep2093
programme.desc: Culinary researcher Yokoyama Takako lives in a mountain region. She cans and ferments local produce to make it through the depths of winter, work supported by nature's bounty and ancestral wisdom.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Somewhere Street S1 Ep4017
programme.desc: Located on Terceira Island, about 1000 kilometers off the coast of Portugal, the designated World Heritage site of Angra do Heroismo is a port town which flourished during the Age of Exploration.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Chatroom Japan S1 Ep6049
programme.desc: Bui Thi Le Dung is a medical interpreter passionate about supporting Vietnamese residents in Japan. She provides her services for free, fueled by a desire to make medical care accessible to everyone.

programme.title: IMPACTS: Climates Change the World S1 Ep6128
programme.desc: With its flammable peatlands, Indonesia's forest fires are among the most serious in Asia. Peatlands release 20 times normal CO2 when burned, causing damage to the atmosphere and natural resources.

programme.title: Crafting Timeless Products S1 Ep6058
programme.desc: Tagawa Kinya (Design engineer)investigates the process of design by looking at the work of Yanagi Sori, who shaped products by making models using different materials.

programme.title: Where We Call Home S1 Ep2087
programme.desc: We meet English-born Roland Gregory, a.k.a. Roly, who runs his own apple orchard in the Nagano countryside, and Gethmina Dinithika from Sri Lanka, who works at a ramen shop in Ueda, also in Nagano.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: KAIZOKU: The Kurushima Straits S1 Ep6025
programme.desc: The Murakami Kaizoku were seafarers and fighters in the Seto Inland Sea. We explore their history and legacy, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time, the Kurushima Straits.

programme.title: BOSAI S1 Ep2090
programme.desc: In Japan, extremely powerful lightning known as a superbolt can occur in the Hokuriku region during winter. What is the source of this power, which is comparable to a small nuclear explosion?

programme.title: Magical Japanese S1 Ep2092
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to sleep. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Easy Japanese S1 Ep6022
programme.desc: #6 Does this train go to Ikebukuro? / Find out how to ask if public transportation goes to your destination. Use the name of the place plus "ni ikimasu ka".

programme.title: Culture Crossroads S1 Ep2084
programme.desc: A Sri Lankan student participates in the Mie Prefecture "Youth Police Supporters" volunteer program that works with communities to build a safer society by preventing crimes before they occur.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLD-JAPAN S1 Ep2104
programme.desc: We intorduce the contents and activities of NHK WORLD-JAPAN to make the station and programs known to more people all over the world. This is the window of the station to the world.

programme.title: Hometown Stories S1 Ep5003

programme.desc: At the Satoyama Kitchen guesthouse in Hida Takayama, chef Nobuko, her cameraman husband Makoto and their cat Tama take us on a tasty journey of local cuisine served with a side of seasonal scenery.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Royval vs. Kape
programme.desc: Main Event - UFC will close out its 2025 campaign with an electric flyweight matchup as top contenders Brandon Raw Dawg Royval shares the Octagon with Manel Starboy Kape on December 14 at the UFC APEX in Las Vegas. A former title challenger and perennial contender, Royval holds wins over Kai Kara-France, Brandon Moreno, and Tatsuro Taira and currently sits at No. 3 in the divisional rankings. Following an uneven start to his UFC tenure, the dynamic Kape has amassed a 6-1 record over his last seven outings, entering off back-to-back stoppage wins over Asu Almabayev and Bruno Silva

programme.title: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 ACROBATICS GOALS
programme.desc: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 ACROBATICS GOALS - Golazo! 10 of the best volleys & scissor kicks that found the net from the Ligue 1 22/23 season.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC313PereiravsAnkalaev
programme.desc: After a historic 2024 that saw him defend his UFC light heavyweight title three times with three knockouts, Brazilian superstar Alex Pereira begins the new year in Las Vegas with a main event clash against number one contender Magomed Ankalaev. Plus former interim lightweight champion Justin Gaithje battles Rafael Fiziev for the second time, and much much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep4
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep7
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep4

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep7
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

A former title challenger and perennial contender, Royval holds wins over Kai Kara-France, Brandon Moreno, and Tatsuro Taira and currently sits at No. 3 in the divisional rankings. Following an uneven start to his UFC tenure, the dynamic Kape has amassed a 6-1 record over his last seven outings, entering off back-to-back stoppage wins over Asu Almabayev and Bruno Silva
